EventsFinder.Title: RSC Shenandoah Hiking Trip
EventsFinder.Description: Ready for some fresh air and breathtaking views? Join us for a Hiking Trip to Shenandoah National Park on Sunday, October 27th! üèûÔ∏è We'll meet on campus at 9 AM, split into small groups (5 per car), and drive out for a day full of hikes and a relaxing picnic.

EventsFinder.Title: CodeFest
EventsFinder.Description: Join us for a day full of coding and collaboration on Tech for Good's semester long coding initiatives! Here we will share three of this semester's endeavors and set aside time to work together on them. Interested in joining a project but don't know how to start? This is the place!

EventsFinder.Title: 2024 Communication Career Forum
EventsFinder.Description: Gain career advice and network with some of the nation's leading communication professionals. Sign up for small group mentoring sessions with public affairs specialists, media producers, journalists, health communicators, marketers, and more! Registration is required. Please remember to dress to impress (business casual) and research the mentors if you are planning to attend!

EventsFinder.Title: BSA Halloween Party
EventsFinder.Description: Join us for our annual Halloween party

EventsFinder.Title: Beginners Guide to CNC Machines
EventsFinder.Description: This is a brief workshop on the CNC machine's the MIX offers. This includes but is not limited to CNC routers (big machines with a rotating bit), CNC Engravers (same as a router but simpler) and PCB Routers (For electronics). In this workshop we will cover how these machines are run and be give a short demonstration of them in action.

EventsFinder.Title: Pancake Breakfast
EventsFinder.Description: Join us in the Honors College Student Lounge to enjoy some delicious pancakes before finals begin.

EventsFinder.Title: Panhellenic Banquet
EventsFinder.Description: Join the Panhellenic Community in celebrating the achievements of its members and welcoming its 2025 Panhellenic Executive Council!

EventsFinder.Title: The Cove: Pot Painting
EventsFinder.Description: Come join us at our Pot Painting event on December 11th! Don‚Äôt miss out on snacks, drinks, & a whole lot of fun! Secure your spot on Mason360!
